name: Load_Cluster2_3
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(SM_Enterprise_Cluster_Sub_3)*>
<*CTX( Container(SM_Enterprise_Cluster_Sub_3).LoadKeys(ListIndex).Load(select <*eval(Replace(Replace("<*VALUE(cluster2)*>","| ","' as LocationCluster UNION SELECT ") + "'","#"," as ListIndex ,'"))*> as LocationCluster  ))*>
